page.title: 18A day in my life
page.content:
by Sarah Gutteridge aged 9
{Monday.}I get out of bed,have a wash,get dressed,go downstairs,have branflakes for breakfast.Put my shoes and coat on.Go and feed the rabbits and chickens.Get ready for school.Go to school by car.Do a maths sheet and spellings.Go to assembly,sing,say a prayer.Come back,write a story.Go out to play.Play on climbing frame.Come in again and do maths until lunchtime.Go to lunch.Go out to play again.I play blockey,manhunt,it or bulldog.Come in and make our model of Paxton's farm. Listen to a story.After story we go home.At home I watch T.V.,then have tea,go outside,play on climbing frame and go to bed.
